description: This file defines a data transfer object (DTO) class 'AccountResponse' used for transferring account information in the internet banking fund transfer service.

classes.name: AccountResponse
classes.description: A DTO class representing account details such as number, balance, type, and status.

methods.name: getNumber
methods.description: Getter for account number (generated by Lombok)

methods.name: getActualBalance
methods.description: Getter for actual balance (generated by Lombok)

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Getter for account ID (generated by Lombok)

methods.name: getType
methods.description: Getter for account type (generated by Lombok)

methods.name: getStatus
methods.description: Getter for account status (generated by Lombok)

methods.name: getAvailableBalance
methods.description: Getter for available balance (generated by Lombok)
